definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Romania and Hungary are operating under I.M.F.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞和匈牙利正在接受國際貨幣基金組織的救助。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania."
sentences.chinese: 普魯特河形成了整個西部與羅馬尼亞的國界線。

sentences.english: You can't really do that in Romania.
sentences.chinese: 在羅馬尼亞你可不能這麼做。

sentences.english: When he was travelling across Romania, he fell into company with a party of gipsies.
sentences.chinese: 他在羅馬尼亞旅行時結識了一羣吉卜賽人。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania.
sentences.chinese: 普魯特河形成了整個西部與羅馬尼亞的國界線。

sentences.english: Union of Transylvania with Romania was ratified in 1920.
sentences.chinese: 1920年，特蘭西瓦尼亞與羅馬尼亞的結盟被批准。

sentences.english: Romulus Ioan Budura claimed himself "one of the first five Romanians who could speak Chinese."
sentences.chinese: 羅明稱自己是“頭5個會說中文的羅馬尼亞人之一”。

sentences.english: Three years later, Romania was overrun by the Soviets and signed an armistice.
sentences.chinese: 三年後，羅馬尼亞被前蘇聯入侵，並簽署了休戰協議。

sentences.english: A big shock for the Romanians of course.
sentences.chinese: 一個羅馬尼亞人的過程中震動很大。

sentences.english: Horn dance (Buciumeana), Romainian Folk Dances, for piano No. 4
sentences.chinese: 號角舞曲，爲鋼琴而作的第4羅馬尼亞民間舞曲。

sentences.english: President Basescu picked up the theme.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞總統伯塞斯庫也談到了這個問題。

sentences.english: The Oranje also face France and Romania in Group C.
sentences.chinese: 橙衣軍團將在C小組中還要面對法國和羅馬尼亞。

sentences.english: Its border with Romania follows the Prut and lower Danube rivers.
sentences.chinese: 它與羅馬尼亞的國界沿着普魯特河和多瑙河下游。

sentences.english: Sash Dance (Brâul), Romanian Folk Dances, for piano No. 2
sentences.chinese: 花腰帶舞，爲鋼琴而作的第2羅馬尼亞民間舞曲。

sentences.english: To Romanians Russia is a predator .
sentences.chinese: 而對羅馬尼亞人而言，俄國人則是掠奪者。

sentences.english: Romania in the Balkans northeast of South-Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞位於東南歐巴爾幹半島東北部。
